1.desc: <size=36>V</size>alley Hospital, a historic general hospital located in a quiet suburb, is a hub of outpatient care, medical research, and nursing services. It is also where Miller was seen last.
1.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during the day/dust/the night.

2.desc: <size=36>T</size>hree years ago, Valley Hospital was brought into the national limelight when allegations surfaced that several unhoused individuals who had camped out overnight in the vicinity of the hospital mysteriously disappeared. Though the whereabouts of these individuals are still unknown to this day, this incident has largely faded from the public's memory.
2.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during the day/dust/the night.

3.desc: <size=36>A</size>fter thoroughly examining the hospital's external design and plumbing system, I realized that there might be a vast, secret underground area beneath the hospital.
3.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during the day/dust/the night.

4.desc: <size=36>I</size>ntelligence agencies from around the world have already begun investigating the hospital, and there may already be agents hiding among us. What secrets could there be under this hospital... or beneath those white coats?
4.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during dust/the night.

5.desc:
<size=36>S</size>trange words such as "bloodkin" and "enthrallment" have been found in the files of the archive room.
Could it be that some sort of eldritch research is taking place here?
5.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during dust/the night.

6.desc: <size=36>D</size>espite the huge disparity between income and expenditure, Valley Hospital has been able to operate normally for a long period of time. For the past three years, it has continuously been receiving large amounts of funding from Akagi, a representative of the Sakura Empire's Tenko Group. If there is a mastermind behind the events here â€“ it must be her!
6.unlock_desc: Clear any stage on during dust/the night.

7.desc: <size=36>I</size>n anticipation of significant foot traffic, the path leading to the medical center was built large. Now, though, it has been overrun with cats, and few people can be seen. This seems to be the result of deliberate negligence by Franklin, the nurse in charge.

8.desc:
<size=36>I</size> found physical examination data of Miller in the live speciment vault.
Body fat percentage, ideal; protein metabolism, ideal; waist and hip measurements... However, the likely most important pages had been torn up, and it will take some time to render them readable.

9.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Report on V-01 Ability Development"
...The 21st activation experiment was a failure. 22nd experiment anticipated to begin shortly. The continued funding of our trusted investor is absolutely critical. Based on previous test data, there is a nigh-infinite amount of potential in this experiment.

10.desc:
<size=36>F</size>or some reason, Valley Hospital's inhouse doctor Eagle has this lavish office all to herself.
There is a locked glass case filled with bottles of fat-burning sauces in various flavors... Is she especially security-minded, or is there some other reason for this?
10.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Doctor's Office Investigation applied.

11.desc:
<size=36>A</size>fter picking the lock, I discovered two communication devices behind the sauce bottles.
One of them had a cute snowflake sticker on its case, and the other had metal ornaments in a fine and classical pattern, emblematic of an exquisite product from the Royal Islands.
11.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Doctor's Office Investigation applied.

12.desc: <size=36>A</size>ccording to the regularly-scheduled comms logs, Eagle and Stremitelny are jointly investigating some experiments into unique abilities within the hospital. Their governments are apparently planning a rescue mission for those trapped inside the hospital.
12.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Doctor's Office Investigation applied.

13.desc: <size=36>T</size>he staircase leading underground lies in the back of the nurses' station, and it has a sign at the entrance reading, "Under Repairs." In order to infiltrate it, it seems I'll need to lure nurse Franklin away from there.
13.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

14.desc: <size=36>T</size>o draw Franklin's attention away, I told her I was waiting for her in my hospital room, and she left her station with a smile. Thus, I managed to infiltrate the underground area and find the medicine room.
14.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

15.desc: <size=36>C</size>oncealed inside the refrigerator in the medicine room, which Eagle and Stremitelny oversee, there were several special tranquilizers. Injecting it into a person allows them to effectively suppress the tendencies of enthrallment. This is presumably the reason why they don't exhibit strange behavior.
15.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

16.desc: <size=36>T</size>he sunbathed inpatient building is a heaven of healing, managed by nurse Mogador. Whilst my body and mind unconsciously relaxed, I happened to notice a security camera hanging overhead.
16.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols and Visitor Restrictions applied.

17.desc: <size=36>T</size>he security camera in the inpatient building is quite the beast, with 80K resolution, precise facial recognition, and gait recognition. It is apparently also waterproof, dustproof, and able to withstand even a meteorite impact. Unfortunately, its circuits had already been cut.
17.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols and Visitor Restrictions applied.

18.desc: <size=36>W</size>hile investigating the control room, I almost ran into Eagle and Stremitelny, who had come to check the offline monitoring system. Luckily, Santa Fe showed up and called them away. As one of the few normal people in this hospital, she seems to be on good terms with them.
18.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols and Visitor Restrictions applied.

19.desc: <size=36>A</size>fter observing the nurses for a few days, I've figured out their shifts. Every night at seven, the nurse on duty, Voroshilov, always clocks out early, giving me 10 minutes during which no one is around.
19.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Nurse Station Investigation applied.

20.desc: <size=36>W</size>hile infiltrating the nurses' station, I found a note on nurse Voroshilov's desk. It was placed right in the middle of the desk, almost as if to say, "Secrets to be found right here!"
20.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Nurse Station Investigation applied.

21.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Enthralled Staff Observation Log" 
...The observees are in an elevated state of mental excitement, and their bodies function well. However, the progression of enthrallment in doctor Eagle and nurse Stremitelny has halted. Closer monitoring in the future required.
21.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Nurse Station Investigation applied.

22.desc: <size=36>S</size>anta Fe's patient room feels disorderly but lived-in at the same time, with the down pillow on her bed being the only orderly thing in there. Could there be something important hidden under it?
22.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, and Sickroom Investigation applied.

23.desc: <size=36>T</size>here was a photograph of Santa Fe and Washington under the pillow. In it, they both struck playful poses, and Washington wore casual clothes and had a smile on her face. She looked almost nothing like the nurse Washington I know.
23.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, and Sickroom Investigation applied.

24.desc: <size=36>I</size>n the photograph's white space, Santa Fe voiced a concern: "What should I do? If I continue helping the government, they're gonna forcibly detain all the victims in the name of 'rescuing' them! That includes Washington... There's my friend and then there's my mission, and I can only choose one of them..."
24.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, and Sickroom Investigation applied.

25.desc: <size=36>T</size>he cargo elevator in the inpatient building is for authorized personnel only. If I want to use it, I'll first have to get past the biometric authentication panel on the startup screen.
25.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

26.desc: <size=36>T</size>he more sophisticated the technology, the more difficult it is to make it secure. After breaching the emergency escape hatch on the elevator's ceiling, I managed to enter the basement of the inpatient building. It looks like... this place is an abandoned laboratory.
26.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

27.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Report on Subject V-01 Ranking Ascension" 
...Ascension failed. The low-ranking test participant remains completely under the high-ranking subject's control. Low-ranking participant's thoughts and behavior remain firmly under the influence of the high-ranking subject.
27.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

28.desc: <size=36>T</size>here were once controversial experiments conducted in the research center. Under nurse Voroshilov's supervision, could it still be a place of reason and science?
28.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Security Alerts applied.

29.desc: <size=36>S</size>ome sort of impulsive emotion seems to be suppressing my sense of reason. The longer I stay in the research center, the stronger this feeling becomes... I need to leave immediately.
29.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Security Alerts applied.

30.desc: <size=36>T</size>he staff at Valley Hospital are clearly researching an unscientific and irrational kind of forbidden power. This power has its origins in the legendary bloodkin, and the phenomenon it induces is known as "enthrallment."
30.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Security Alerts applied.

31.desc: <size=36>I</size> heard what sounded like a beeping noise coming from the vent in the research center's reception room. Is it possible that the vent connects to a larger space?
31.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and RC Underground Investigation applied.

32.desc: <size=36>I</size> descended down the vent and arrived in a power room covered in dust. After investigating the smart power system, I learned that there are two spaces underneath the research center that are still in use â€“ the control room, and another, unnamed room.
32.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and RC Underground Investigation applied.

33.desc: <size=36>T</size>here was no one in the control room, and several screens only displayed tedious noise. One of them, however, showed a feed of a young girl, alone and curled up in some sealed-off room â€“ it was Miller!
33.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and RC Underground Investigation applied.

34.desc: <size=36>T</size>he high-end therapeutic services the recuperation center provides used to bring in big bucks for the hospital. The area supervisor, nurse Washington, recommended to me her favorite area â€“ a spa smelling of lavender.
34.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols and Special Doctor's Interview applied.

35.desc: <size=36>I</size> found several objects of unknown ownership in the locker room at the reception. One of them was a "gossip journal," detailing the hospital's supposed secrets in great detail... No wonder the owner didn't leave their name.
35.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols and Special Doctor's Interview applied.

36.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Gossip Journal - Entry 5"
When the person staying in room 7 goes sleepwalking, she holds up a fake sword and yells, "In dreams, slaying people is my calling"...
The one staying in room 13 has a lot of adventure plans hidden behind the curtain...
36.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols and Special Doctor's Interview applied.

37.desc: <size=36>W</size>hile investigating room 13, I found a map leading to an area beneath the recuperation center behind the curtain. An eye-catching line was written in red pen on the map: "It used to rake in so much money, so why was it abandoned all of a sudden?"
37.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

38.desc: <size=36>T</size>he area under the recuperation center used to serve as a VIP room, which has now been divided into several independent rooms, along with many doors being installed... Have they turned this place into a staff dormitory under strict protection?
38.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

39.desc: <size=36>I</size>n front of a door labeled "Suzuya," I found what seems to be an "SVIP Unlimited Premium Gold Card." Who could've dropped something as precious as this?
39.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Underground Area Investigation applied.

40.desc: <size=36>T</size>he logistics center manages all the work processes in the hospital from start to finish. It's a boring but extremely important place. Suzuya, the nurse in charge of the area, supports the smooth running of Valley Hospital with her meticulousness and perseverance.
40.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Strange Noises applied.

41.desc: <size=36>I</size>nside the logistics center's digital archives, I found a few stamped, unsent reports. They were addressed to intelligence agencies around the world.
41.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Strange Noises applied.

42.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Report on Subject V-01 Termination" 
Subject status: Deceased.
Cause of death: Due to the intervention of a higher-ranking subject, the test subject chose to end her own life.
42.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Strange Noises applied.

43.desc: <size=36>T</size>hey say that the logistics center stores more secrets than the inventory list, and it's true. The biggest secret of all, though, lies behind a filing cabinet stuffed to the brim â€“ a secret passage leading to an underground area.
43.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Underground Area Investigation applied.

44.desc: <size=36>I</size>nside the area under the logistics center, I found a vault containing huge sums of cash. There was also Valley Hospital's balance sheet lying on a table outside the vault.
44.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Underground Area Investigation applied.

45.desc:
<size=36>"</size>Audit on Valley Hospital's Quarterly Finances (Internal)" 
...Quarterly profits are down 75% compared to the same period last year, the debt-to-asset ratio is nearing 170%, and the cash flow is expected to dry up within three months. Furthermore, the repayment period of a debt of three billion will expire at the end of next month...
45.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols and Underground Area Investigation applied.

46.desc: <size=36>U</size>nlike the city with its hustle and bustle, the entrance sign at Valley Hospital's parking lot always reads, "Parking Available." There are so few cars parked here that you could count them at a glance.
46.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Parking Lot Investigation applied.

47.desc: <size=36>A</size>lthough their windshields are covered with dust, the ambulances themselves were bought from a big-name global brand, and their excellent performance could even meet the standards of a rescue on a battlefield. It all speaks to the once impressive financial power of Valley Hospital.
47.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Parking Lot Investigation applied.

48.desc: <size=36>T</size>hese vehicles are so heavily armored, they're practically small forts on wheels. Not only can they be used to protect and transport important targets, but they can also serve as mobile jails to detain suspects.
48.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Parking Lot Investigation applied.

49.desc: <size=36>T</size>here were weeds growing rampantly all over the unmaintained parking lot. After a lot of hard work, I finally managed to find a way down to the underground area beneath a shrub.
49.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Security Alerts, and PL Underground Investigation applied.

50.desc: <size=36>T</size>he underground parking lot has obviously been repurposed into a storage room. There were boxes upon boxes of medical cloth and oxygen tanks stacked haphazardly, and on the wall was a handwritten warning that said, "Flammable Material."
50.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Security Alerts, and PL Underground Investigation applied.

51.desc: <size=36>T</size>here were a few canisters quietly tucked away deep in a corner that meet the international standards for storing oil and the like, and the air was filled with the harsh, distinct smell of hydrocarbon compounds â€“ it's safe to assume that there was gasoline in those containers.
51.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Security Alerts, and PL Underground Investigation applied.

52.desc: <size=36>T</size>he guard booth is the key point through which all information to and from the outside world passes, and it is of great strategic importance. Sending and receiving things through here neatly resolves the inconvenience caused by the lack of supporting facilities around the hospital.
52.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Guard Booth Investigation applied.

53.desc: <size=36>I</size> found a package addressed to Voroshilov. The sticker listing its contents said, "Rebellious girl's first choice, eye-catching punk high-school miniskirt giving a hot and naughty impression." I suppose you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.
53.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Guard Booth Investigation applied.

54.desc: <size=36>A</size>fter watching the guard booth several times, I noticed that Voroshilov stopped by every day to see if a new package arrived, even though she had yet to wear any of the clothes in them... Where do all those clothes go?
54.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, and Guard Booth Investigation applied.

55.desc: <size=36>T</size>he stone pillars in the corridor, white as the ribs of a giant, prop up an arch-shaped ceiling mural, with angels glowing with holy light. When the sunlight passed through the arch, I discovered a secret space hidden in the niche of the corridor.
55.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Endless Corridor applied.

56.desc: <size=36>T</size>he Banquet of Blood, Confessions of the Night Girl, The Pallid Bride's Sonnet â€“ these gothic novels tear off the fetters of reason and weave luxurious fantasies filled with desire... Who hid these novels here?
56.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Endless Corridor applied.

57.desc: <size=36>W</size>hoever left these novels here also carved a message into the secret space: "Roses never wither in the eternal paradise we yearn for. Daywalkers rule everything until time itself turns to dust in its coffin."
57.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Endless Corridor applied.

58.desc: <size=36>T</size>he tall hedges surrounding the garden make up a convoluted maze, blocking the view of it from the outside. Solving the maze isn't particularly hard â€“ what's more thought-provoking is the hospital's deliberate attempt to conceal something.
58.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Garden Investigation applied.

59.desc: <size=36>T</size>he snow-white gazebo at the heart of the maze is strikingly immaculate, and the fresh coat of paint smells so strongly it's almost hard to breathe. It's evident someone rebuilt this place from the ground up very recently.
59.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Garden Investigation applied.

60.desc: <size=36>W</size>hile passing by the garden pond, a snack wrapper clinging desperately to the drain caught my attention â€“ it was Miller's favorite snack. She must have stayed here, but where is she now?
60.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Garden Investigation applied.

61.desc: <size=36>I</size>t so happens it's the time of year when the cherry blossoms go into full bloom. There is a rumor around Valley Hospital that "flesh and blood are buried under the cherry tree, sprouting into beautiful flowers nourished by betrayal and passion."
61.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Alluring Cherry Tree applied.

62.desc: <size=36>I</size> couldn't find a single plant growing at the tree's roots. Closer investigation revealed there's a soft spot in the soil, which someone probably dug up carefully and quite recently â€“ despite the fact that nothing is growing there.
62.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Alluring Cherry Tree applied.

63.desc: <size=36>U</size>sing a shovel to dig in the eerily soft soil, I found a communications badge. The badge had a symbol of a fox with red tails on it... Could this belong to the Tenko Group?
63.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Alluring Cherry Tree applied.

64.desc:
<size=36>A</size> small forest stretches out from the southeast to the southwest of the hospital.
While it's not unwelcoming to visitors, anyone who prefers more lively places would probably unconsciously avoid it.
64.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Forest Investigation applied.

65.desc: <size=36>D</size>uring the night, I saw Santa Fe leave her hospital room and return around an hour later. The place she went to? The small forest.
65.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Forest Investigation applied.

66.desc:
<size=36>A</size>fter tracing her footsteps, I found an Eagle Union-made portable communicator hidden in a tree at the perfect height.
Without a doubt, this is the reason why Santa Fe left the hospital at night.
66.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Forest Investigation applied.

67.desc: <size=36>T</size>he gates to the hospital are made of sturdy cast iron, and they're wide enough for several large cars to pass through at once. A faded hospital emblem is inlaid on top of the gate, and a row of mailboxes for the hospital staff is attached to the wall on the side.
67.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Main Entrance Investigation applied.

68.desc: <size=36>D</size>ue to the mailboxes being exposed to the elements, their surfaces have deteriorated to the point the metal on them is peeling off. Suzuya's mailbox is the only one that's been maintained, indicating that it sees frequent use.
68.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Main Entrance Investigation applied.

69.desc: <size=36>I</size> found a credit card bill inside Suzuya's mailbox. The amount owed is 10 times the salary of a regular nurse â€“ she must have another source of income in order to maintain such ludicrous spending.
69.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols and Main Entrance Investigation applied.

70.desc: <size=36>V</size>alley Hospital's rear entrance has been closed for many years, and the no-entry sign to the side of the rusted gates has already faded in color. Fallen leaves pass through this forgotten place more often than people do.
70.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Rear Entrance Investigation applied.

71.desc: <size=36>I</size> removed the pile of debris stacked up in front of the rear entrance and easily detached the rusted padlock on the gates. The path in front of me led into the woods â€“ it looked like the perfect escape route.
71.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Rear Entrance Investigation applied.

72.desc: <size=36>T</size>he forest path leads to a bustling port to the north of the city, where passenger boats, merchant vessels, and cargo ships come and go endlessly. The low peeping of whistles echoed in my ears for a long time, like a call to a distant place.
72.unlock_desc: Clear ESP Medical Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Rear Entrance Investigation applied.

73.desc: <size=36>M</size>ogador, head nurse of the inpatient building. She provided rather "passionate" assistance when I was doing the admission procedure.
73.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during dusk (excluding ESP Medical Center).

74.desc: <size=36>S</size>weet and direct on the one hand, and unwaveringly determined in serious circumstances on the other. Her response to even the slightest disruption of order is a merciless purge.
74.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during dusk (excluding ESP Medical Center).

75.desc: <size=36>H</size>er body temperature is abnormally high, her sense of smell exceedingly sharp, and in the depths of her irises, a quivering crimson red... It's safe to assume she is in an advanced stage of enthrallment.
75.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during dusk (excluding ESP Medical Center).

76.desc: <size=36>I</size>f what Nurse Franklin had seen and heard in the medical center over the past few years were turned into a book, it would no doubt be a thrilling "adventure" novel.
76.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols applied.

77.desc: <size=36>K</size>ind, receptive, and brimming with creativity and curiosity, Franklin has received countless written commendations as the hospital's most outstanding employee. Those commendations, now yellowed and faded, are precious to her.
77.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols applied.

78.desc:
<size=36>T</size>he enthrallment has warped her emotions, and she will stop at nothing to ensure the survival of all her fellows.
What should have been an adventure filled with oddity and excitement has fallen into the trap known as the desire for control.
78.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols applied.

79.desc: <size=36>W</size>ashington, the head nurse of the recuperation center and a frequent visitor to the national boot camp, is particularly skilled in nonviolently subduing frenzied mental patients within 30 seconds. While her knowledge of tactics is outstanding, her skill as a nurse has much room for improvement.
79.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Visitor Restrictions applied during the night.

80.desc: <size=36>W</size>hen she gets fired up, she occasionally slips into some Eagle Union slang. It's said that she's from there, which gives her and Santa Fe endless things to talk about.
80.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Visitor Restrictions applied during the night.

81.desc: <size=36>T</size>ap into your potential and embrace power â€“ do that, and you will always be victorious. The enthrallment seemed to be everything Washington wanted, but alas, extraordinary power invariably comes at a price.
81.unlock_desc: Clear T1 Inpatient Building with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Visitor Restrictions applied during the night.

82.desc: <size=36>P</size>rior to becoming the head nurse of the logistics center, Suzuya was the queen of the phlebotomy room. People say that she won the "most blood drawn in one shot" competition five years in a row.
82.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols applied.

83.desc: <size=36>A</size>lthough she's gentle, unassuming, and polite with everyone she interacts with, there is an odd kind of emotional detachment in her behavior. She seems to intentionally avoid involvement with other nurses and appears to be keeping an eye on me... Does she know about my true reason for getting hospitalized?
83.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols applied.

84.desc: <size=36>W</size>hile the enthrallment is definitely eating away at her mind, she refuses to yield to the impulses running through her. She seems sure she can regain the life she lost â€“ who gave her that hope?
84.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols applied.

85.desc: <size=36>V</size>oroshilov, the head nurse of the research center, is in fact an undercover agent for the Northern Parliament. I was more surprised that she willingly divulged that information than by the information itself.
85.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Special Doctor's Interview applied during the night.

86.desc: <size=36>R</size>ather than speaking her mind, she prefers to slowly build up a relationship over time. Or so I thought, but now she is being proactive to an unusual degree... Perhaps that's a part of some plan of hers?
86.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Special Doctor's Interview applied during the night.

87.desc: <size=36>T</size>he crimson madness has taken full control of her, and her level of enthrallment is more severe than anyone else's. Just for what reason did this strange power choose her as its mouthpiece?
87.unlock_desc: Clear T2 Recuperation Center with Regular Patrols, Suspicious Shadows, Strange Noises, and Special Doctor's Interview applied during the night.

88.desc: <size=36>E</size>agle, currently Valley Hospital's only in-office orthopedic surgeon, appears to be mentally holding up well. From what I gathered from other employees, she was hired half a year ago. Judging by the hospital's financial state, it hardly seems to have been a sound decision.
88.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Suspicious Shadows and Strange Noises applied.

89.desc: <size=36>S</size>he takes her job as a doctor very seriously. No complaints on that front. However, she has shockingly little technical knowledge... When you hang your X-ray pictures upside down, how can a patient trust you?
89.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Suspicious Shadows and Strange Noises applied.

90.desc: <size=36>I</size> was unable to find a match with the number on her doctor's certificate in the public database, and considering her peculiar taste for traditional Royal "gourmet" food, the conclusion is obvious â€“ she is an undercover agent sent by the Royal Navy.
90.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Suspicious Shadows and Strange Noises applied.

91.desc: <size=36>N</size>urse Stremitelny took up her post at the same time as Eagle, and her state of mind is quite good. Often bothered by how her petite stature interfered with her work, she decided to start wearing "a grown lady's high heels"... They suit her surprisingly well.
91.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols applied.

92.desc: <size=36>S</size>he has undergone comprehensive medical training and is able to single-handedly carry out her duties as a nurse, but her approach to healthcare comes in an extremely regional flavor â€“ which is to say, it's the authentic vodka medical philosophy.
92.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols applied.

93.desc:
<size=36>S</size>he is an undercover agent from the Northern Parliament, and her goal at the hospital is to look into her fellow missing agent Voroshilov.
When I saw through her disguise, she got as excited as a child and gave me several small snowballs. As "rewards."
93.unlock_desc: Clear T3 Logistics Center with Regular Patrols applied.

94.desc: <size=36>S</size>anta Fe, my roommate at the hospital, never stays in bed quietly as the doctors advise. She effortlessly picks up on the gossip hidden in people's words, almost like she has a delicate gossip detector installed in her head.
94.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Logistics Center with Security Alerts applied.

95.desc: <size=36>H</size>er hospital gown only seems to hinder her passionate "seven good deeds a day." I've never seen a patient as energetic as her before â€“ her diagnosis of mild electrolyte imbalance and her prescription of vitamin supplements are far too normal in every way.
95.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Logistics Center with Security Alerts applied.

96.desc: <size=36>O</size>n that nerve-racking night, her sleeptalk was miraculously soothing, and the true identity of this "patient" became as plain as the nose on my face â€“ the Eagle Union really should raise the standards they hold their agents to.
96.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Logistics Center with Security Alerts applied.

97.desc: <size=36>M</size>iller. She is my friend of many years and my partner. Out of all the people I've met, she is the most contradictory and the most talented. We have solved many cases together, which earned us the title of "best detective duo."
97.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, Suspicious Shadows, and Strange Noises applied during the night.

98.desc: <size=36>C</size>ontrary to what her rebellious fashion sense might make you think, she is a strict perfectionist. She probably wanted to prove to me that she was a worthy partner, and that's why she took on the Valley Hospital case on her own.
98.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, Suspicious Shadows, and Strange Noises applied during the night.

99.desc: <size=36>I</size> know all about her â€“ she's more accustomed to working at night than at day, she likes red colors... and she keeps many secrets. She'll probably tell me the truth herself one day â€“ after all, she is one half of the best detective duo.
99.unlock_desc: Clear T4 Research Center with Regular Patrols, Security Alerts, Suspicious Shadows, and Strange Noises applied during the night.

100.desc: <size=36>H</size>ow does this young lady of an old lineage on the brink of bankruptcy maintain such a refined lifestyle? Rumors say that she makes a living by renting out noble titles, but that can't be more than a drop in the bucket.
100.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the day (excluding ESP Medical Center).

101.desc: <size=36>T</size>o my surprise, Halford's financial situation isn't as dire as people speculate. According to the intel, Miller has helped her a lot, and their respective families supposedly came from the same region... That being said, Miller herself has never brought this up before.
101.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the day (excluding ESP Medical Center).

102.desc: <size=36>H</size>alford's family name is quite ancient, and people say it comes from a vampiric duke of 300 years ago... When she dropped this lore bomb, her expression didn't look as though she was joking, so let's take it at face value.
102.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the day (excluding ESP Medical Center).

103.desc: <size=36>A</size>kagi, a representative of the Tenko Group from the Sakura Empire. Even though her public appearances draw extensive attention from the media, very little is known about her private life.
103.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the night (excluding ESP Medical Center).

104.desc: <size=36>S</size>he is arrogant, forceful, and possesses preeminent abilities. Despite us coming from such different walks of life, the moment she saw me, her eyes were filled with the kind of love so powerful it could change the rules of the world.
104.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the night (excluding ESP Medical Center).

105.desc: <size=36>S</size>he revealed everything to me. She is trying to construct a throne of pure crimson â€“ through the pain of "the minority" and some "fitting" sacrifices, the world will turn a new page... Should I really support her?
105.unlock_desc: Clear any stage during the night (excluding ESP Medical Center).
